resource.chars:
Military 1843 Department 
No 2
Extract from the Minutes 
of Consul[t]ation
12th December 1843.
Referred to in Military Letter 
to England dated 26th March 1844
No 16 Para 1
Ordering that Extract be com 
municated to Lieutt Ludlow,
Superintendent of the Magnetic 
Observatory at Madras & to the Military 
Auditor General.
Recd via Southampton 
11th May 1844
